name: es6-webextension-boilerplate
description: A boilerplate for writing WebExtensions in ES6 with Webpack

scripts.build:sourcezip: bestzip web-ext-artifacts/source.zip extension src package.json web-ext-config.js webpack.config.js
scripts.version:patch: npm version patch && node src/utils/version-sync && git add . && git commit -m "updated manifest version (patch)"
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor && node src/utils/version-sync && git add . && git commit -m "updated manifest version (minor)"
scripts.version:major: npm version major && node src/utils/version-sync && git add . && git commit -m "updated manifest version (major)"

author: J.R. Mathis (https://github.com/mathiscode)
